sentences.sContent: ...Anyone interested or intend to inquire about please do not feel hesitated to contact Xiao Li...
...many young people intend to experience different cultures...
...Why does the man intend to grow potatoes rather than corn on the farm...
I fully intended (= definitely intended) to pay for the damage.
sentences.sCn: 我确实诚心想赔偿损失。

sentences.sContent: What exactly did you intend by that remark?
sentences.sCn: 你那句话到底想说什么？

trans.tranOther: to have a plan, result or purpose in your mind when you do sth
